questions.name: What language does 'Renaissance' originate from?
questions.body: Renaissance means rebirth, but what language does it come from?

questions.name: When was the Renaissance?
questions.body: Which time period was this era of history?

questions.name: Which of the following subjects flourished during this era?
What is Galileo known for?
questions.body: Galileo was a notable figure during the Renaissance; what did he do?

questions.name: What did the Church try to do during this time?
questions.body: Think about what the role of the Church was during the Renaissance?
options: Censor anything that conflicted with their teachings and beliefs
Spread Christianity across all parts of the world
questions.expected: Censor anything that conflicted with their teachings and beliefs

title: Voyagers/Explorers Quiz
description: Questions about the explorers during the Renaissance

questions.name: Which countries were the leaders during the Age of Exploration?
questions.body: Leading countries during the early stages of the Age of Exploration

questions.name: What was the nationality of the first explorer to sail the globe?
questions.body: Who led the first global expedititon?

questions.name: Which of the following is the definition of circumnavigation?
options: travel completely around something (like a globe)
questions.expected: travel completely around something (like a globe)

questions.name: What was a negative effect of the Columbian exchange?
questions.body: Think about what the Columbian exchange was
options: Farmers in the Americas ran out of crops to grow
Europe suffered a shortage of horses for battle
Diseases such as smallpox and measles were spread
questions.expected: Diseases such as smallpox and measles were spread
